meanings.definition: The quality or state of being special.
meanings.sent1: Her specialness shone through in her kindness towards others.
meanings.sent2: The specialness of the gift made her smile with joy.
meanings.sent3: His specialness in always remembering birthdays made him the favorite uncle.
meanings.sent4: The specialness of her talent was like a bright light in a dark room.
meanings.sent5: The specialness of the moment was etched in her memory forever.

meanings.definition: Something that is distinct or unique.
meanings.sent1: The specialness of the rare gem caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: Each snowflake has its own specialness, just like each person.
meanings.sent3: The specialness of the unicorn's horn made it the envy of all other creatures.
meanings.sent4: The specialness of her voice was like a melody never heard before.
meanings.sent5: The specialness of the antique vase made it a prized possession.

meanings.definition: A characteristic that sets someone or something apart from others.
meanings.sent1: His specialness in always being on time made him a reliable friend.
meanings.sent2: The specialness of her style made her a trendsetter in the fashion world.
meanings.sent3: The specialness of the cat's ability to open doors amused the whole family.
meanings.sent4: The specialness of the old tree's branches reaching towards the sky was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The specialness of the star athlete's speed was unmatched on the field.
